# Periapt of Health
## Overview
**Aura** faint conjuration; **CL** 5th

**Slot** neck

**Price** 7,500 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

The wearer of this blue gem on a silver chain (worn on the neck) is immune to disease, including supernatural diseases.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Remove Disease (Spell)|remove disease]]*

**Cost** 3,750 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 525
